note.p: Birth: Cork, County Cork, Ireland (25 September 1819)
Death: The Provost's House, Trinity College, Dublin, Ireland (22 January 1904)
Burial: Mount Jerome cemetery, Dublin, Ireland
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1833), MA (1844), BD and DD (1859)

Career: Fellow of Trinity College, Dublin; Donegal Lecturer in Mathematics (1848-1866); Professor of Mathematics; Regius Professor of Divinity, Trinity College, Dublin (1866-1888); Provost of Trinity (1888-1902)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 347-355 signed by C J J
References: Tony Crilly, 'The Young Arthur Cayley' in NR 1998 vol 52 pp 267-282
